oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate reunion ribbon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reunion ribbon from the "Eighth Annual Reunion" for the 1st and 6th Georgia Cavalry Regiments, CSA. The ribbon belonged to Dr. Robert Young Rudicil. Rudicil served as the surgeon of the 6th Georgia Cav. Regt., CSA and surrendered with his regiment in North Carolina at the end of the war.
